name: FAST for Fuel Cells
short_description:
Fundamental Analysis and Simulation Toolbox (FAST) for Fuel Cells (fc)

FAST-fc is a derivative of FC-APOLLO that was developed under funding by the U.S. Department of Energy.  

FAST-fc is developed and maintained by the original creators and developers of FC-APOLLO.  

Features of FAST-fc include transport of gases and liquids, multi-step reaction kinetics, transient and steady state operation for performance and durability, and scalable dimensionality from 1D - 3D domains.

Future development work is on-going in FAST-fc and our strategic developement schedule includes membrane degradation, improved liquid water transport models through the application of pore networks, and extension to stack-level simulation.
